item.title: How to Stay on Top of Slack?
item.description: credits Getty Images TL;DR Use and abuse reminders! You can jump to the how to section if you are already sold on the idea. Slack has become one of the most popular workplace messaging platforms these days. This is especially true in newly established organisations. Being a really big proponent of using all things modern and having struggled all my life with finding a way to like email, I quickly embraced Slack as my favourite messaging app.
